
## ``hc_size``

Changing the size of a highchart object

#### Description 

Changing the size of a highchart object

#### Usage
<pre><code>
hc_size(hc, width = NULL, height = NULL)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.
* width A numeric input in pixels.
* height A numeric input in pixels.

#### Examples
```{r}
hc_size(hcts(rnorm(100)), 400, 200)
```
